Translations.Text: yakhana akasa bidirna habe
ara tara rabera adesa palana karabe ebam eta'i tara karaniya
Ara yakhana yaminake samprasarita kara habe
Ara yamina tara abhyantare ya ache ta ba'ire niksepa karabe o sun'yagarbha habe
ebam tara rabera adesa palana karabe eta'i tara karaniya
He manusa! Tumi tomara rabera kache paucha paryanta kathora parisrama karate habe, atahpara tumi tamra saksata labha karabe
Atahpara yake tara ‘amalanama tara dana hate deya habe
tara hiseba-nikesa sahaje'i neya habe
ebam se tara sbajanadera kache [1] praphullacitte phire yabe
ara yake tara ‘amalanama tara pithera pichanadika theke deya habe
se abasya'i tara dhbansa dakabe
ebam jbalanta agune dagdha habe
niscaya se tara sbajanadera madhye anande chila
Se to bhabate ye, se kakhane'i phire yabe na
hyam, [1] niscaya tara raba tara upara samyaka drsti danakari
Atahpara ami sapatha karachi [1] pascima akasera
ara sapatha ratera ebam ta ya kichura samabesa ghataya tara
ebam sapatha camdera, yakhana ta purna haya
abasya'i tomara eka stara theke an'ya stare arohana karabe
Atahpara tadera ki hala ye, tara imana ane na
ara yakhana tadera kache kura'ana patha kara haya takhana tara sajda kare na
baram kaphirara mithyaropa kare
Ara tara ya posana kare allah ta sabisesa abagata
Kaje'i apani taderake yantranadayaka sastira sambada dina
kintu yara imana ane o satkaja kare tadera jan'ya rayeche nirabacchinna puraskara
Sapatha burujabisista [1] asamanera
ara pratisruta dinera
ebam drasta o drstera
abhisapta hayechila [1] kundera adhipatira
ye kunde chila indhanapurna aguna
yakhana tara era pase upabista chila
ebam tara muminadera sathe ya karachila ta pratyaksa karachila
Ara tara taderake niryatana karechila sudhu e karane ye, tara imana enechila parakramasali o prasansara yogya allahara upara
asamanamuha o yaminera sarbamaya kartrtba yamra; ara allah sabakichura pratyaksadarsi
Niscaya yara mumina nara-narike bipadapanna kareche [1] tarapara ta'oba kareni [2] tadera jan'ya ache jahannamera sasti, ara tadera jan'ya ache dahana yantrana
Niscaya yara imana eneche ebam satkaja kareche tadera jan'ya rayeche jannata, yara padadese nadi prabahita; eta'i mahasaphalya
Niscaya apanara rabera pakara'o bara'i kathina
Tini'i astitba dana karena o punarabartana ghatana
ebam tini ksamasila, atisnehamaya
arasera adhikari o sam'manita
Tini ya icche ta-i karena
Apanara kache ki paumcheche sain'yabahinira brttanta
phira‘a'una o samudera
tabu kaphirara mithyaropa karaya rata
Ara allah sabadika theke taderake paribestana kare rayechena
Bastuta eta sam'manita kura'ana
sanraksita phalake lipibad'dha
Sapatha asamanera ebam rate ya abirbhuta haya tara
ara kise apanake janabe ‘rate ya abirbhuta haya’ ta ki
ujjbala naksatra
Pratyeka jibera upara'i tattbabadhayaka rayeche
Ata'eba, manusa yena cinta kare dekhe take ki theke srsti kara hayeche
take srsti kara hayeche sabege sthalita pani hate
eta nirgata haya merudanda o panjarasthira madhya theke
Niscaya tini take phiriye anate saksama
Yedina gopana bisaya pariksita habe
sedina tara kono samarthya thakabe na ebam sahayyakari'o naya
Sapatha asamanera, ya dharana kare brsti
ebam sapatha yaminera, ya bidirna haya
niscaya ala-kura'ana mimansakari bani
Ebam eta nirarthaka naya
Tara bhisana sarayantra kare
ebam ami'o bhisana kausala kari
Ata'eba, kaphiraderake abakasa dina; taderake abakasa dina kichu kalera jan'ya
